devdoc.details: Designed to be cloned - uses initialize pattern instead of constructor

params._assembly: Address of the Assembly creating this contest
params._prompt: The question or prompt for this contest
params._requiredPassports: Array of passport token IDs required to vote
params._votingDuration: Duration of voting period in seconds

returns.votes: Array of vote counts for each option

getWinner().details: In case of tie, returns the lowest index option

returns.winningVotes: Number of votes for the winner

params.optionIndex: Index of the option to vote for

devdoc.title: Contest

MAX_OPTIONS().notice: Maximum number of options allowed per contest

__init(address,address,string,string[],u.notice: Initializes the contest (called by Assembly after cloning)

assemblyAddress().notice: The Assembly that created this contest

canVote(address).notice: Check if a specific address can vote

hasVoted(address).notice: Track who has voted: address => hasVoted

initialized().notice: Check if contest has been initialized

isActive().notice: Check if voting is currently active

isGated().notice: Check if contest is gated by passports

requiredPassports(uint256).notice: Required passport token IDs (empty array = open voting)

timeRemaining().notice: Get time remaining in voting period

vote(uint256).notice: Cast a vote for an option

userdoc.notice: A time-bound voting mechanism for Assemblies to make decisions
